title: Eye Care-Focused Biopharma Firm SpyGlass Files for US IPO
description: SpyGlass Pharma Inc. filed for an initial public offering to help fund late-stage trials of its intraocular lens and drug delivery solutions to treat patients with chronic eye conditions such as glaucoma.
content: SpyGlass Pharma Inc. filed for an initial public offering to help fund late-stage trials of its intraocular lens and drug delivery solutions to treat patients with chronic eye conditions such as glaucoma.
